Plot: After an explosion in space and subsequent two-minute radio-out period, two astronauts return home to their wives. Slightly it's revealed that they're not the same as they were.
Title: The Astronaut's Wife
Actors: Johnny Depp, Charlize Theron, Joe Morton, Clea DuVall
tomatoConsensus: Despite the best efforts of its talented leads, The Astronaut's Wife moves at a snail's pace and fails to generate enough intrigue to keep viewers engaged.
